.  It is 48 km from Bareilly and is the greenest area.
From Lucknow it is 250 km and takes 6 hours. Train route is meter gauge from Lucknow.  Well connected from Lucknow and Bareilly through roads and rail.

value: directions=In the feilds on the Pilibhit-Bisalpur Road

Pilibhit Tiger Reserve near Sherpur Kalan. The protected forest holds an amazing ecosystem of over 400 square miles and provides a good prey base for the elegant cats. Other National Parks like Corbett and Dudhwa in India and Royal Shukla Phatan in Nepal are close by.
